I think that all the Prophets are same they all are same for Allah (S.W.T)..But in the country i live i feel that they don't give much importances to other Prophets but only to Hazrat Muhammad S.A.W like praising him and etc...but i think all the prophets should be repected...I am a practicing Muslims and i love all the Prophets they are all same for me, but everyone should follow Hazrat Muhammad S.A.W and thats what i m doing also...but with the people i think they should also give importance to other Prophets as equal to Hazrat Muhammad S.A.W....please explan me that wheather my comments are correct or not?

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh

Every Prophet is a messenger of Allah and each one of them deserves respect. Muhammad (SAW) is the most superior of all of them as authentically proven. However, when praising one, the others should not be shown disrespect in any way.

And Allah knows best
